abstract: The return of “Lost” — albeit a two-hour repeat of the last season finale — buoyed ABC’s ratings on a night otherwise dominated by Fox’s “American Idol” and “Moment of Truth.” According to Nielsen’s estimates, the two Fox programs delivered the night’s largest audiences by far, 25.3 million viewers at 8 p.m. for “American Idol” followed by 17.9 million for “The Moment of Truth” at 9 p.m.
lead_paragraph: The return of “Lost” — albeit a two-hour repeat of the last season finale — buoyed ABC’s ratings on a night otherwise dominated by Fox’s “American Idol” and “Moment of Truth.” According to Nielsen’s estimates, the two Fox programs delivered the night’s largest audiences by far, 25.3 million viewers at 8 p.m. for “American Idol” followed by 17.9 million for “The Moment of Truth” at 9 p.m.

headline.main: Fox’s Reality Squirmfests Continue to Deliver
